what are you trying to do: I have an .avi file and want to convert it to either (3gp, .3g2, .mp4, .wmv) so I can watch it on my phone, how can i do that?
well,, not sure they are supported with ffmpeg however to test it  open a terminal..cd to the location of the file you want ti convert and the command would be     ffmpeg -i nameof.avi  nameof.mp4
and that would apply to any format you want to convert to
